text: Aure sur Mer is a commune. It is found in the region Normandy in the Calvados department. The municipality was created on 1 January 2017 and consists of the former communes of Sainte-Honorine-des-Pertes (the seat) and Russy.Arrêté préfectoral 9 December 2016 == References == Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Calvados
title: Aure sur Mer
